problem_names:
lemma tauPres:
  fixes P :: pi
  and   Q :: pi
  
  assumes "P \<approx>\<^sup>s Q"

  shows "\<tau>.(P) \<approx>\<^sup>s \<tau>.(Q)"

lemma inputPres:
  fixes P :: pi
  and   Q :: pi
  and   a :: name
  and   x :: name

  assumes PeqQ: "P \<approx>\<^sup>s Q"

  shows "a<x>.P \<approx>\<^sup>s a<x>.Q"

lemma outputPres:
  fixes P :: pi
  and   Q :: pi
  
  assumes "P \<approx>\<^sup>s Q"

  shows "a{b}.P \<approx>\<^sup>s a{b}.Q"

lemma matchPres:
  fixes P :: pi
  and   Q :: pi
  and   a :: name
  and   b :: name

  assumes "P \<approx>\<^sup>s Q"

  shows "[a\<frown>b]P \<approx>\<^sup>s [a\<frown>b]Q"

lemma mismatchPres:
  fixes P :: pi
  and   Q :: pi
  and   a :: name
  and   b :: name

  assumes "P \<approx>\<^sup>s Q"

  shows "[a\<noteq>b]P \<approx>\<^sup>s [a\<noteq>b]Q"

lemma parPres:
  fixes P :: pi
  and   Q :: pi
  and   R :: pi

  assumes "P \<approx>\<^sup>s Q"

  shows "P \<parallel> R \<approx>\<^sup>s Q \<parallel> R"

lemma resPres:
  fixes P :: pi
  and   Q :: pi
  and   x :: name

  assumes PeqQ: "P \<approx>\<^sup>s Q"
  
  shows "<\<nu>x>P \<approx>\<^sup>s <\<nu>x>Q"

lemma bangPres:
  fixes P :: pi
  and   Q :: pi
  
  assumes "P \<approx>\<^sup>s Q"

  shows "!P \<approx>\<^sup>s !Q"
translations:
lemma tauPres:
  fixes P :: pi
  and   Q :: pi
  
  assumes "P \<approx>\<^sup>s Q"

  shows "\<tau>.(P) \<approx>\<^sup>s \<tau>.(Q)"

proof (prove)
using this:
  P \<approx>\<^sup>s Q

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. \<tau>.P \<approx>\<^sup>s \<tau>.Q
by(force simp add: substClosed_def intro: Weak_Early_Bisim_Pres.tauPres)

lemma inputPres:
  fixes P :: pi
  and   Q :: pi
  and   a :: name
  and   x :: name

  assumes PeqQ: "P \<approx>\<^sup>s Q"

  shows "a<x>.P \<approx>\<^sup>s a<x>.Q"

proof (state)
this:
  P \<approx>\<^sup>s Q

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. \<And>\<sigma>. a<x>.P[<\<sigma>>] \<approx> a<x>.Q[<\<sigma>>]

proof (prove)
using this:
  P \<approx>\<^sup>s Q

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. P[<\<sigma>>] \<approx>\<^sup>s Q[<\<sigma>>]

proof (state)
this:
  P[<\<sigma>>] \<approx>\<^sup>s Q[<\<sigma>>]

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. \<And>\<sigma>. a<x>.P[<\<sigma>>] \<approx> a<x>.Q[<\<sigma>>]

proof (prove)
using this:
  P[<\<sigma>>] \<approx>\<^sup>s Q[<\<sigma>>]

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. \<forall>y. P[<\<sigma>>][x::=y] \<approx> Q[<\<sigma>>][x::=y]

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. \<And>y.
       \<forall>\<sigma>.
          P[<\<sigma>>][<\<sigma>>] \<approx>
          Q[<\<sigma>>][<\<sigma>>] \<Longrightarrow>
       P[<\<sigma>>][x::=y] \<approx> Q[<\<sigma>>][x::=y]
by(erule_tac x="[(x, y)]" in allE) auto

proof (state)
this:
  \<forall>y. P[<\<sigma>>][x::=y] \<approx> Q[<\<sigma>>][x::=y]

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. \<And>\<sigma>. a<x>.P[<\<sigma>>] \<approx> a<x>.Q[<\<sigma>>]

proof (state)
this:
  \<forall>y. P[<\<sigma>>][x::=y] \<approx> Q[<\<sigma>>][x::=y]

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. \<And>\<sigma>. a<x>.P[<\<sigma>>] \<approx> a<x>.Q[<\<sigma>>]

proof (state)
this:
  x \<sharp> \<sigma>

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. \<And>\<sigma>. a<x>.P[<\<sigma>>] \<approx> a<x>.Q[<\<sigma>>]

proof (chain)
picking this:
  \<forall>y. P[<\<sigma>>][x::=y] \<approx> Q[<\<sigma>>][x::=y]
  x \<sharp> \<sigma>

proof (prove)
using this:
  \<forall>y. P[<\<sigma>>][x::=y] \<approx> Q[<\<sigma>>][x::=y]
  x \<sharp> \<sigma>

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. a<x>.P[<\<sigma>>] \<approx> a<x>.Q[<\<sigma>>]

  a<x>.P[<\<sigma>>] \<approx> a<x>.Q[<\<sigma>>]

this:

this:

 1. \<And>\<sigma>. a<x>.P[<\<sigma>>] \<approx> a<x>.Q[<\<sigma>>]
obtain y::name where "y \<sharp> P" and "y \<sharp> Q" and "y \<sharp> \<sigma>"

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. (\<And>y.
        \<lbrakk>y \<sharp> P; y \<sharp> Q; y \<sharp> \<sigma>\<rbrakk>

proof (state)
this:
  y \<sharp> P
  y \<sharp> Q
  y \<sharp> \<sigma>

goal (1 subgoal):

using this:

this:

goal (1 subgoal):

using this:

goal (1 subgoal):

proof (state)
this:

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. \<And>\<sigma>. a<x>.P[<\<sigma>>] \<approx> a<x>.Q[<\<sigma>>]

proof (state)
this:
  a<y>.([(x, y)] \<bullet> P)[<\<sigma>>] \<approx>
  a<y>.([(x, y)] \<bullet> Q)[<\<sigma>>]

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. \<And>\<sigma>. a<x>.P[<\<sigma>>] \<approx> a<x>.Q[<\<sigma>>]

proof (chain)
picking this:
  y \<sharp> P
  y \<sharp> Q
have "a<x>.P = a<y>.([(x, y)] \<bullet> P)" and "a<x>.Q = a<y>.([(x, y)] \<bullet> Q)"

proof (prove)
using this:
  y \<sharp> P
  y \<sharp> Q

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. a<x>.P = a<y>.([(x, y)] \<bullet> P) &&&
    a<x>.Q = a<y>.([(x, y)] \<bullet> Q)

proof (state)
this:
  a<x>.P = a<y>.([(x, y)] \<bullet> P)
  a<x>.Q = a<y>.([(x, y)] \<bullet> Q)

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. \<And>\<sigma>. a<x>.P[<\<sigma>>] \<approx> a<x>.Q[<\<sigma>>]

proof (chain)
picking this:
  a<y>.([(x, y)] \<bullet> P)[<\<sigma>>] \<approx>
  a<y>.([(x, y)] \<bullet> Q)[<\<sigma>>]
  a<x>.P = a<y>.([(x, y)] \<bullet> P)
  a<x>.Q = a<y>.([(x, y)] \<bullet> Q)

proof (prove)
using this:
  a<y>.([(x, y)] \<bullet> P)[<\<sigma>>] \<approx>
  a<y>.([(x, y)] \<bullet> Q)[<\<sigma>>]
  a<x>.P = a<y>.([(x, y)] \<bullet> P)
  a<x>.Q = a<y>.([(x, y)] \<bullet> Q)

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. a<x>.P[<\<sigma>>] \<approx> a<x>.Q[<\<sigma>>]

proof (state)
this:
  a<x>.P[<\<sigma>>] \<approx> a<x>.Q[<\<sigma>>]

lemma resPres:
  fixes P :: pi
  and   Q :: pi
  and   x :: name

  assumes PeqQ: "P \<approx>\<^sup>s Q"
  
  shows "<\<nu>x>P \<approx>\<^sup>s <\<nu>x>Q"
have Res: "\<And>P Q x s. \<lbrakk>P[<s>] \<approx> Q[<s>]; x \<sharp> s\<rbrakk> \<Longrightarrow> (<\<nu>x>P)[<s>] \<approx> (<\<nu>x>Q)[<s>]"

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. \<And>P Q x s.
       \<lbrakk>P[<s>] \<approx> Q[<s>]; x \<sharp> s\<rbrakk>
       \<Longrightarrow> <\<nu>x>P[<s>] \<approx> <\<nu>x>Q[<s>]
obtain c::name where cFreshP: "c \<sharp> P" and cFreshQ: "c \<sharp> Q" and cFreshs: "c \<sharp> s"

proof (prove)
using this:
  \<lbrakk>?P[<?s>] \<approx> ?Q[<?s>]; ?x \<sharp> ?s\<rbrakk>
  \<Longrightarrow> <\<nu>?x>?P[<?s>] \<approx> <\<nu>?x>?Q[<?s>]

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. (\<And>c.
        \<lbrakk>c \<sharp> P; c \<sharp> Q; c \<sharp> s\<rbrakk>
        \<Longrightarrow> thesis) \<Longrightarrow>
    thesis

proof (state)
this:
  c \<sharp> P
  c \<sharp> Q
  c \<sharp> s

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. \<And>\<sigma>. <\<nu>x>P[<\<sigma>>] \<approx> <\<nu>x>Q[<\<sigma>>]
have "P[<([(x, c)] \<bullet> s)>] \<approx> Q[<([(x, c)] \<bullet> s)>]"

proof (prove)
using this:
  P \<approx>\<^sup>s Q

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. P[<([(x, c)] \<bullet> s)>] \<approx> Q[<([(x, c)] \<bullet> s)>]

proof (state)
this:
  P[<([(x, c)] \<bullet> s)>] \<approx> Q[<([(x, c)] \<bullet> s)>]

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. \<And>\<sigma>. <\<nu>x>P[<\<sigma>>] \<approx> <\<nu>x>Q[<\<sigma>>]
hence "([(x, c)] \<bullet> P[<([(x, c)] \<bullet> s)>]) \<approx> ([(x, c)] \<bullet> Q[<([(x, c)] \<bullet> s)>])"

proof (prove)
using this:
  P[<([(x, c)] \<bullet> s)>] \<approx> Q[<([(x, c)] \<bullet> s)>]

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. [(x, c)] \<bullet> P[<([(x, c)] \<bullet> s)>] \<approx>
    [(x, c)] \<bullet> Q[<([(x, c)] \<bullet> s)>]

proof (state)
this:
  [(x, c)] \<bullet> P[<([(x, c)] \<bullet> s)>] \<approx>
  [(x, c)] \<bullet> Q[<([(x, c)] \<bullet> s)>]

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. \<And>\<sigma>. <\<nu>x>P[<\<sigma>>] \<approx> <\<nu>x>Q[<\<sigma>>]

proof (prove)
using this:
  [(x, c)] \<bullet> P[<([(x, c)] \<bullet> s)>] \<approx>
  [(x, c)] \<bullet> Q[<([(x, c)] \<bullet> s)>]

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. ([(x, c)] \<bullet> P)[<s>] \<approx> ([(x, c)] \<bullet> Q)[<s>]

proof (state)
this:
  ([(x, c)] \<bullet> P)[<s>] \<approx> ([(x, c)] \<bullet> Q)[<s>]

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. \<And>\<sigma>. <\<nu>x>P[<\<sigma>>] \<approx> <\<nu>x>Q[<\<sigma>>]

proof (prove)
using this:
  ([(x, c)] \<bullet> P)[<s>] \<approx> ([(x, c)] \<bullet> Q)[<s>]

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. <\<nu>c>([(x, c)] \<bullet> P)[<s>] \<approx>
    <\<nu>c>([(x, c)] \<bullet> Q)[<s>]

proof (prove)
using this:
  ([(x, c)] \<bullet> P)[<s>] \<approx> ([(x, c)] \<bullet> Q)[<s>]
  c \<sharp> s

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. <\<nu>c>([(x, c)] \<bullet> P)[<s>] \<approx>
    <\<nu>c>([(x, c)] \<bullet> Q)[<s>]

proof (state)
this:
  <\<nu>c>([(x, c)] \<bullet> P)[<s>] \<approx>
  <\<nu>c>([(x, c)] \<bullet> Q)[<s>]

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. \<And>\<sigma>. <\<nu>x>P[<\<sigma>>] \<approx> <\<nu>x>Q[<\<sigma>>]

proof (state)
this:
  <\<nu>c>([(x, c)] \<bullet> P)[<s>] \<approx>
  <\<nu>c>([(x, c)] \<bullet> Q)[<s>]

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. \<And>\<sigma>. <\<nu>x>P[<\<sigma>>] \<approx> <\<nu>x>Q[<\<sigma>>]

proof (chain)
picking this:

  c \<sharp> Q
have "<\<nu>x>P = <\<nu>c>([(x, c)] \<bullet> P)" and "<\<nu>x>Q = <\<nu>c>([(x, c)] \<bullet> Q)"

proof (prove)
using this:

  c \<sharp> Q

goal (1 subgoal):

this:

  <\<nu>x>Q = <\<nu>c>([(x, c)] \<bullet> Q)

goal (1 subgoal):

picking this:
  <\<nu>c>([(x, c)] \<bullet> P)[<s>] \<approx>
  <\<nu>c>([(x, c)] \<bullet> Q)[<s>]
  <\<nu>x>P = <\<nu>c>([(x, c)] \<bullet> P)

using this:
  <\<nu>c>([(x, c)] \<bullet> P)[<s>] \<approx>
  <\<nu>c>([(x, c)] \<bullet> Q)[<s>]
  <\<nu>x>P = <\<nu>c>([(x, c)] \<bullet> P)

lemma bangPres:
